  class Patterns::Subject
</h1>

<section class="description">

    <p><a href=“Subject.html”>Subject</a> -&gt; <a href=“../Object.html”>Object</a></p>

    <p>Contains a list of observers that are watching this subject</p>

    </pre>

<div id="method-i-notify" class="method-detail ">

  <div class="method-heading">
    <span class="method-name">notify</span><span
      class="method-args">(notification, event)</span>

    <span class="method-click-advice">click to toggle source</span>

  </div>

  <div class="method-description">

    <p>Notifies the observer of some change</p>

    <ul><li> <p>notification - The notification to send to the observers</p> </li><li> <p>event - The event to send to the observers</p> </li></ul>

    <p>Examples</p>

    <pre class=“ruby”>=<span class=“ruby-operator”>&gt;</span> <span class=“ruby-identifier”>subject</span>.<span class=“ruby-identifier”>notify</span>(<span class=“ruby-string”>&#39;An event just happened!&#39;</span>, <span class=“ruby-identifier”>the_event</span>) </pre>

    <div class="method-source-code" id="notify-source">
  <pre><span class="ruby-comment"># File app/models/observer/subject.rb, line 51</span>

    <span class=“ruby-keyword”>def</span> <span class=“ruby-identifier”>notify</span>(<span class=“ruby-identifier”>notification</span>, <span class=“ruby-identifier”>event</span>)

    <span class="ruby-ivar">@observers</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">each</span> <span class="ruby-keyword">do</span> <span class="ruby-operator">|</span><span class="ruby-identifier">observer</span><span class="ruby-operator">|</span>
  <span class="ruby-identifier">observer</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">on_notify</span>(<span class="ruby-identifier">notification</span>, <span class="ruby-identifier">event</span>)
<span class="ruby-keyword">end</span>

    <span class=“ruby-keyword”>end</span></pre>

        </div>
  </div>

</div>

  </div>

  <div class="method-description">

    <p>Examples</p>

    <pre class=“ruby”>=<span class=“ruby-operator”>&gt;</span> <span class=“ruby-identifier”>subject</span>.<span class=“ruby-identifier”>remove_observer</span>(<span class=“ruby-identifier”>subject_observer</span>) </pre>

    <div class="method-source-code" id="remove_observer-source">

    <span class=“ruby-keyword”>def</span> <span class=“ruby-identifier”>remove_observer</span>(<span class=“ruby-identifier”>observer</span>)

    <span class="ruby-ivar">@observers</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">delete</span>(<span class="ruby-identifier">observer</span>)

    <span class=“ruby-keyword”>end</span></pre>
